content: I was looking for an app that gave local weather and fire warnings. Since installing i have not recieved and alerts. Im looking for high wind warnings and flash floods. Its windy as heck today and not one alert. Im not sure this is the right app for what i need. After recieving reply from developer ive decieded to uninstall this app. Its not what i was looking for.
replyContent: Hello Scott, thanks for the feedback. The app doesnt send out alerts, it depends on other apps creating notifications (e.g. email, SMS) e.g. if you get an email saying "HIGH WINDS" from a weather service, you can create a rule in Emergency Alert to play an audio alert (even on silent). Pls contact support if you need help with rules, happy to help!

content: Great app. Wanted this so my wife could let me know if she needed help in a serious way. Very configurable with multiple emergency categories you can set up. Tech support follow up from the developer was fantastic.
replyContent: Hi Gary, than you very much for the positive review - all the best!

content: I am using this application with an Isocket power failure module. Not being up on computers and android phones I needed a lot of help and Ryan was fantastic. This is a great product and would recommend it for anyone. Works very well and is extremely versatile. I feel it is very under priced for what it can do.
replyContent: Hi Leonard, thanks for your positive review - much appreciated!

content: I really like this app. It has more than I need, as I only need one emergency category. I'm a psychologist, and this allows my clients to text a code to me if they are in crisis. But, if I wanted to set another tune to play if my child's phone contacted me, I could. It works fine, it's reasonably simple, even for a technological dinosaur like me. And, when I needed help with the app, Ryan, the builder, emailed me back within a few hours, and gave me very clear instructions on what I needed to do.
replyContent: Hi Beth, many thanks for your review, glad we got your issue sorted!

content: Very nice app that works as advertised and is a very good replacement for the Fire Alert app. Would love to see the options to only play the alert for a limited amount of time, during a specific time window, and to not do the audio if the phone is in use or is in silent mode.
replyContent: Thank you for your review! Rule schedules will be in the next release, coming in the new year! Also have the other two on the to do list ðŸ‘

content: Like other users, I've been looking for a replacement for Alarmbox and similar apps which used to work on older versions of Android. I have a Xiaomi phone, and have found it particularly difficult to find a suitable app that works. But this one does the job perfectly, and the developer was really helpful when I had a couple of teething issues getting it set up - just make sure the app has all the permissions set appropriately, including allowing it to create pop up windows when running in the background.
replyContent: Hi Edvin, many thanks for the positive review, glad we got the issue sorted for you!

content: Neat app for alarm on text message. For raises alarm if I get a message for traffic challan
replyContent: Hi Pawan, many thanks for the positive feedback!

content: Waste of money, worked intermittently and now Does not work
replyContent: Hi Andrew, sorry to hear you are having issues, can you contacts us from Help Â» Email Support from within the app and we'll get you up and running.

content: Exactly what needed, works awesome! Thank you.
replyContent: Thanks very much for the positive review!

content: Great app works very well and exactly what I needed
replyContent: Thanks for the positive review!

content: Hi, had to replace fire alarm 2 as it was flagged for reading personal information. Purchased this app and it works great, as advertised. I would recommend it as a replacement for other alert apps ðŸ‘
replyContent: Hi Andy, thanks very much for the review - glad it meets your requirements!

content: Simple and effective! Like another user below, I was looking for a replacement for the old "Fire alert" app. We use this app to get our attention for after hours calls when we are on call. Just so new potential users are clear, the way we use it is; we get a text with some key words including "emergency" and then this app takes over to alert us. The initial text is handled by another system. I'm very happy I found this and I highly recommend it
replyContent: Hi Vic, thanks very much for the positive review!

content: Amazing app saved my headeche of worry about receiving un attended system alerts while I am on call. Thank you so much and continue good work system support teams will love this ðŸ‘
replyContent: Thanks for the positive review, Mohan!

content: Works well, but repeats custom sound repeatedly. Would be great if it would play sound once, then have an option for repeating the sound on a configurable interval.
replyContent: Hi Matt, thanks for your feedback. I'll look into it. As for the notification, if you go in to your device settings>apps>Emergency Alert>notifications, you can disable banner notifications there.

content: I needed a replacement for fire alert 2 and hit the jackpot running into Emergency Alert app! Thank you. My secondary on call thanks you too. ;)
replyContent: Hi Adam, thank you very much for the positive feedback!

content: Being a firefighter I'm using the app with the SMS dispatch system of our fire department. It's great as a backup to my pager and for scenarios where I am not taking the pager with me. Best feature (/bug?) compared to other apps I have been using before is, that you can dismiss an alarm on vibration by just pressing the lock/unlock button on your phone twice. That's great as I don't loose time taking the phone out of my pocket and it's possible to safely dismiss the alarm while driving.
replyContent: Thanks for the positive review!

content: Works great after update and now have the option of different alert tones from other apps such as zedge
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Martin. I'll see what I can do to add more tones

content: Excellent. This app works with your current SMS app and doesn't replace it. Perfect for any person who is on call for their job. I can filter for key words from my help desk so I know what is urgent or not. One minor suggestion. Can you make the phones built in tones also also available as an option to pick?
replyContent: Hi Kevin, thanks for your review! I'll look into your suggestions and see what I can do.

content: Very useful when your phone is on silent mode!
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Dominykas!

content: Gets the job done. I work as an EMT and I have to rely on text messages from work a lot, but text messages won't really wake me up in the middle of the night. With this app, you can set it up so the alarm will go off if a certain person or word is said in a text message. It was initially difficult to understand how to set it up, but it has been the best thing for me after I figured it out.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback Jesse!

content: Best app to use as a Pager system. I work for UK Sar/Lowland Rescue. Ive tried many apps over the years, this has to be the simplest and most convenient to use, all others froze my phone and induced a restart. This works flawlessly! Great piece of kit.
replyContent: Hi Ben, many thanks for your positive feedback!

content: It just works which is great. It was hard to find an app for sysadmins to shout when servers are down!
replyContent: Thanks for the positive review, Fernando!

content: I was using another similar app (Fire Alert 2), but it stopped working after a few OS updates and was happy to find this app. Not (yet) all the features as the other, but works perfectly for my needs.
replyContent: Hi Bill, thanks for the positive feedback. What additional features would you like to see? Feel free to drop us an email from Help Â» Email Support from within the app.

content: Nice, works for on call messages!! I use to use SMS alarm. But since my phone updated to Android 10 it doesn't work. This does :)
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback Kyle!

content: I volunteer with a UK SAR organisation, this app is perfect for triggering callout alarms. Simple to use and reliable!
replyContent: Thanks for your positive feedback, Paul, much appreciated!

content: Works great so far. If it actually wakes me up is to be determined. However, it would be great to be able to add multiple filters (eg by Notification Title and Body)
Working perfectly as expected. Great app. Provide an option to choose own sound.
replyContent: Thanks for the positive feedback! Working on the option to include custom sounds ðŸ‘

content: UPDATE : Best app ever for emergency response and great support from developer ðŸ˜ Works. I am a volunteer lifeboat crew. We have a pager and also receive a text message when tasked. My pager is unreliable so I rely on the text. This works a treat and hasn't missed a rescue text yet. It works at wakening me in the middle of night. Only thing I would like to see added if more options for alarms although not required as the alarm is loud and annoying enough to get attention Thanks
replyContent: Thanks for the positive feedback, more sound options are now available within the app, including volume ðŸ‘

content: I am a SAR team member and I was looking for an app to replace Firealert 2 which appears to have gone away. So far, so good! Looking forward to custom alerts sounds as others have indicated. Please add the following to the wish list ... The ability to control the volume of all rules at the app level rather than the rule level, preferably using a widget. Sounds levels could be High. Medium, Low, Vibrate Only, and off. I would also like to see time windows at the rule level. I am a 35+ year IT professional, more than happy to help you test new features.
replyContent: Hi Michael, thank you for the positive feedback, glad you like the app. Thanks for the ideas, I will be running a beta soon, feel free to join the program from the Google Play store listing for the app - I look forward to your feedback ðŸ‘

content: I just installed this app and I'm setting it up mainly for my text message alerts I get from the fire department. I only want to use this app specifically for those texts incase I'm not next to my phone. Where it says criteria is that where I put that contact? How do I get it to only sound off the alert i choose for the fire department only?
replyContent: Hi Maggie, if you have a contact called "Fire Department" that is displayed in your notification title (how this is displayed may differ depending on the app/phone you have) when you get a taxt, - set up a rule for "Notification Title Starts With" and then enter "Fire Department" as the criteria. Pls. contact support by email if you need more help!

content: A fantastic app once I'd realised with the help of Ryan (Developer) that my Samsung Messages wasn't allowing the app to see notifications and pick up on trigger words after a phone update. Ryan was really helpful and pointed me in the right direction. Very quick to respond and great support. This app is a great replacement for the now obsolete Fire Alert app. It's used by myself to receive notifications of callouts and is a really effective solution to otherwise potentially missing important information. Can definitely recommend this app for anyone wanting a good reliable txt msg trigger word alert / alarm. Thanks
replyContent: Thanks very much for your positive feedback, Al!

content: Removed immediately after installing to invasive permissions.
replyContent: Hi Dave, which permissions were invasive? All permissions used by the app are required in order for it to function. Happy to help, please contact the support email address if you require any further info!

content: Great app that does exactly what it says it does without asking for a bunch of unnecessary permissions. I am a database administrator and use monitors to send myself SMS texts to alert me of various issues ranging in severity from I can deal with it later, to I need to know right now. I was looking for a way to make sure I get woke up in the middle of the night, or didn't miss a critical alert because I had my phone on silent. I had it set up within 2 minutes of downloading it and so far this app has worked flawlessly. I have also given my kids the "Key" word to send me in a text if they need to get in touch with me urgently. Imagine missing a text that my son or daughter is stranded somewhere and needed me. Great peace of mind. Best .99 I ever spent.
replyContent: Hi Robert, thanks very much for your positive review, much appreciated ðŸ˜„

content: I am a volunteer firefighter in Bavaria. There are some emergencies that they only notify by sms. This is the solution I have been searching for. The other way we are notified is by a siren going off in our village. It is the same siren that is used all over Germany, Austria, and Czech Republic (probably all of Europe, but mot sure). It sounds like an air raid siren. Could you add that sound to this app? If so, I will let every Fire Department know in the area about your app.
replyContent: Hi Allen, thank you for your positive review! In the future there will be the ability to load in your own audio files - If you're able to record a sample of it or get an MP3 of it, you will be able to load this into the app. Currently due to COVID-19 I am focusing on the stability of the app, but work on custom sounds has already begun.

content: Great App. Just what I was looking for. Works very well. Developer is responsive and improves the app all the time. Yet, rules are too simple. Would be nice if it has a logical and/or for title/body. Thanks for this app.
replyContent: Thanks for the positive review Goren, multiple filters within a rule is planned - the update now has the ability to change between 7 predefined sounds and also provides a volume control.

content: Love it.
replyContent: Hi Brian, many thanks for your positive review!

content: I needed an app for Search and Rescue as my prev app didn't work with my new phone... Xiaomi Pocophone F1 with Android 10. It didn't work straight away as I had overlooked the auto start permission. Ryan was extremely helpful with email support until all was working. Simple and effective alert app. This app has been improved with additional tones, enabling me to set rules for a callout/stand down/stand by. Has worked reliably since installation. An update feature in app would be perfect.
replyContent: Hi B, thanks for the positive review! Just to let you know, in the latest release you can now choose different alert tones!

content: Good app simply works A+++
replyContent: Thanks for the positive review!

content: Initially I couldn't get it to work on my Huawei P20 lite, but a couple of emails to the developer, who was exceptionally helpful, ensured that I got it working correctly. Does exactly what I need it to do and it will give me emergency alerts if phrases that I predetermine are received via email, SMS etc. Thanks.
replyContent: Hi Ben, thanks for the feedback, glad you're up and running ðŸ‘

content: Very useful. I use it for urgent notification during the night at work. I think that the ability to use with all kinds of notification it's really good. More sound options or time options will be great.
replyContent: Hi Donato, thanks for the positive review, custom sounds are coming. I like the idea of time options as well, if you could provide more detail on that and drop it in an email to support that would be great!

content: Really nice app, very straight forward to set up and it works reliably. I'm using it to wake up even in the night when we have an alarm for our volunteer lifeboat. The only thing I'm missing are more sound options, but that's a minor issue.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! More sound options are now available :)

content: This is exactly what I have/had been looking for. I'm caring for an aging parent and it's a comfort to know that if she needs me quickly, all mom has to do is text me [our alert phrase] and my phone will make me take notice. No stressing about missing a text, or "Oops, my phone was still on silent". I can imagine other scenarios this could be helpful with including kids, logistics, or internal/event EMS/security. Anyway, VERY nice work! Really well thought out. And thank you!
replyContent: Hi Aaron, thanks very much, it's great to hear how customers use the app!

content: Works excellently now, very happy with the app now and the customer service!
replyContent: Hi Zomian, thanks for your review. There is a new beta available which will hopefully resolve your issue, could you give it a try and send feedback to support? Thanks!

content: Great app! However, I would like to change the notification sound and dont see a way to do so. I tried doing so in phone settings-->notifications but no joy.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Jordan, you can now change the alert tone for each rule - 7 options are now included and the ability to upload your own will be in a future release.

content: Brilliant App to use with a SMS based alarm system. once you get it setup theres no missing an alarm
replyContent: Thanks for the positive feedback!

content: Great app!  Works as described, with a very responsive developer! Great for getting paged during I.T. emergencies but still having peace of mind.
Junk
replyContent: Hi Steve, could you let me know why you've rated the app as "Junk" ? I'd be happy to help. Please feel free to drop us an email.

content: Won't alert when the message comes from an email address, which is how my alarm monitor sends activity alerts out. That stated, if all you want is for it to alert for messages from other phones, it does that nicely.
replyContent:
Hi Christopher,

v2.0+ now supports notifications and not just SMS - so for the first time, emails can be supported by setting up a notification rule for email notifications. In addition, any app that sends notifications can now generate alerts in Emergency Alert if an associated rule is created!

content: Using on HTC Desire. This app is really useful. My burglar alarm can send out calls and or text messages, so I programmed it to send out a red alert in the event of an alarm activation. I was very impressed because the app even works if I used 'force stop'. The red alert noise is loud enough to be heard but wasn't startling or intrusive, so I really like that feature. Finally, I was pleased the file was as small as it is because my phone is crammed as it is! Great app!
I use it for my family to contact me in emergency with red alert or for important information you can use yellow alert .
